summary: Circle | USDC Payments, Treasury Management, & Developer Tools - Circle offers USDC payments, treasury management, and developer tools. They provide stablecoins like USDC and EURC, as well as services like Circle Mint and Cross-Chain Transfer Protocol. They also offer programmable wallets and a smart contract platform. Circle caters to developers, providing learning resources, documentation, and insights. They emphasize transparency and have a strong company presence with pressroom, investor relations, support portal, and career opportunities.
